name: Perseverantia
description:
What do you do against your nightmares?

perseverantia (latin for perseverance) is a 3d tower defense game about fighting nightmares using illumination.

Controls

Only mouse. Click on a tower you want to build and place it where you want to fight with darkness. You pay for these towers by your happiness. More happiness, more light in your life.

When darkness comes to the end of your mind path, it takes your sanity. If you are low on your sanity, you will be lost in darkness forever.

Esc - Pause game.

Important!

The player score may not be counted in the browser. Better play it on your desktop or mobile phone.

The game was created by Anna Vičíková @Redcoff.

3D models are created by Robert Benák.
